text: By its very nature the beautiful is isolated from everything else. From beauty no road leads to reality.
author: Hannah Arendt

text: For all of nature's wonder and beauty, it is also hostile and unpredictable.
author: Liam Neeson

text: Beauty, whether moral or natural, is felt, more properly than perceived.
author: David Hume

text: Accuracy is, in every case, advantageous to beauty, and just reasoning to delicate sentiment. In vain would we exalt the one by depreciating the other.
author: David Hume

text: Filipinos don't wallow in what is miserable and ugly. They recycle the bad into things of beauty.
author: Imelda Marcos
